import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import createDeck from "./CreateDeck"; const tempInfo = { "deckId": 1, "deckTitle": "Title", "deckInfo": "Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah", "deckSize": "3" } function deckMaker(){ return (
{tempInfo.deckTitle}

{tempInfo.deckSize} cards

{tempInfo.deckInfo}

) } export default deckMaker;
